actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide for the availability of timber and other forest products in wilderness areas to individuals exclusively for use as firewood in their personal residences.
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text: Amends the Wilderness Act to direct the Secretaries of Agriculture and of the Interior, with respect to wilderness areas under their respective jurisdictions, to provide by regulation for the availability of timber and other forest products in each of those wilderness areas for cutting and removal by individuals exclusively for personal use as firewood in their personal residences.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the availability of timber and other forest products in wilderness areas to individuals exclusively for use as firewood in their personal residences.
